item.title: Mari Gold
item.description: NO Mari Gold ! You don’t get to call - a wrap of leaf salad drizzled with vinagarette and some flavorless yam, doused in running egg yolk - a KATHI ROLL! Such a disgrace! Wasn’t too excited about going here initially and now I’m more than convinced not to look back once. ðŸ”—
